description:
Nami makes a frantic dash for the Sea Train station, Chopper searches desperately for Zoro and Luffy, and Sanji plays it cool while waiting for the right time to spring into action.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le train des mers sifflera une fois ! Des amis qui se séparent
Nakama o Hikihanasu Kiteki! Hashiridasu Umi Ressha
The Steam Whistle Forces Friends Apart! The Sea Train Starts to Run!
تجبر صافرة البّخارِ الأصدقاءَ على الفراق! يبدأ القطار البحريّ بالمسير!
仲間を引き離す汽笛! 走り出す海列車
